text:
Hi,

Change on Fill Rule (nonzero, evenodd) does not update the canvas, unless the
point/coordinated of the element is changed then it will update the canvas

Here I attached the sample program to reproduce

Best Regards
Tonny Kohar
creator: tonny@kiyut.com
